search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Survicate (survicate.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Survicate can be found here: [https://survicate.com/pricing/](https://survicate.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1: Survicate logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/607423c82ba2bf318c39aabc_logo-icon_survicate.svg)![Image 2: Survicate logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/60a266513f9948eebdc866e2_Survicate-logo.svg)](https://survicate.com/)

Feedback programs and plans that grow with you
----------------------------------------------

Looking to scale feedback automation? Our plans grow with you.
--------------------------------------------------------------

Try paid features for free -

learn more

![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/6495881b12b4a5998b3f8bdd_arrow%20down%20(1).svg)

USD

![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/63e4ba202e2d540136a6547e_down-arrow-svgrepo-com.svg)

What's included

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ab6e12c902c98b45843f08_sprint.svg)

Get started with ease

*   Collect feedback across email, link, and web
*   Create a survey with AI or template  
    
*   Display survey logic  
    

![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac61a4f99b0c996630da0e_bar_chart_4_bars.svg)

Track feedback & spot trends

*   Calculated CX metrics
*   Survey analytics & overtime reports  
    

![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac61b862356f646a321fe3_conversion_path.svg)

Powerful integrations

*   10+ tool integrations
*   HubSpot, ActiveCampaign, Klaviyo, Intercom, and more  
    

![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac61c87f451efb710cbb77_local_police.svg)

Built-in security

*   GDPR Compliance & other Data Privacy laws
*   ISO 27001 certified  
    
*   Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) & Google SSO  
    

[See all features](https://survicate.com/pricing/#pricing-compare-plans)

Best for:

*   Short-term projects or testing and experimenting with feedback

All from Free, plus:

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac62236570f2f3d2bcc1df_3p.svg)

Collect essential feedback

*   2 active surveys
*   Unlimited Responses with overage charges

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac62231e8ca62834aa7b8b_palette.svg)

Professional branding

*   Add your company logo
*   Build a brand theme library
*   Custom intro and thank-you screens

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac62235f6cf3edef9b4aed_emoji_objects.svg)

Clear and actionable insights

*   Survey-level analytics
*   Export raw data and visual reports  
    
*   AI survey answers categorization  
    
*   AI Research Assistant chat  
    

![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac622362356f646a32b377_support_agent.svg)

Human support

*   Talk with a human in less than 5 min
*   Book office hours with Customer Success  
    

[See all features](https://survicate.com/pricing/#pricing-compare-plans)

Monthly billing

Best for:

*   Teams running regular customer feedback programs

Yearly billing

All from Starter, plus:

![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac625b4138cc96baf609d5_forum.svg)

Unlimited active surveys

*   Unlimited active surveys
*   Recurring surveys
*   Static Feedback Button
*   Manage survey frequency and throttling

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac625cb6c2cad48084d5e8_guardian.svg)

Personalize every interaction

*   Recall respondent and answer data
*   Multilingual surveys
*   Target by session behavior, attributes, cookies
*   Retarget based on previous responses

![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac62235f6cf3edef9b4aed_emoji_objects.svg)

Advanced insights with AI

*   AI sentiment analysis
*   Insights Hub 
*   Categorize feedback from App Store, Play Store and Google Business Reviews into topics
*   Question-level topic categorization with AI

![Image 16](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac625b0e2d8c0350f11cac_groups.svg)

Built for teams

*   10 user seats
*   Manage roles & permissions  
    
*   Hide Survicate branding  
    

[See all features](https://survicate.com/pricing/#pricing-compare-plans)

Best for:

*   Collecting high-volume feedback from big audiences
*   Simple, quick surveys like post-purchase and website feedback

What's included:

![Image 17](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac65a842997040147f8e83_chat_paste_go_2.svg)

Scale feedback without breaking the bank

*   Cost-effective for handling high-volume responses
*   All feedback channels: email, link, website, in-product and mobile app  
    
*   Mobile SDKs for iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, and Unity Add on  
    
*   Target a percentage of your traffic

![Image 18](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac65a8882b0a1c2a2e1898_ar_on_you%20(1).svg)

Measure CX effortlessly

*   Continuously track NPS and CSAT metrics
*   Upload screenshots and add custom action screens  
    
*   Branded survey experience  
    
*   Set limits on survey responses, expiration date, and sample size  
    

![Image 19](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac65a84566714cca31e246_add_chart.svg)

Manage and analyze at scale

*   Survey-level analytics, metrics and key insights
*   Reliable AI categorization of open-text answers  
    

![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac622362356f646a32b377_support_agent.svg)

Support always by your side

*   Priority live chat queue
*   Built-in data privacy  
    

[See all features](https://survicate.com/pricing/#pricing-compare-plans)

Best for:

*   Businesses with complex customer journeys using surveys across channels
*   Gathering in-depth, lifecycle feedback across key customer touchpoints

What's included:

![Image 21](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac625b4138cc96baf609d5_forum.svg)

Personalized feedback experience for all users

*   All feedback channels: email, link, website, in-product and mobile app
*   Mobile SDKs for iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, and Unity Add on  
    
*   Personalize survey experience and design  
    
*   Target with events, custom attributes, JavaScript and survey sampling  
    

![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac65d3c5a448da71670569_target%20(1).svg)

Bullseye targeting

*   Event-based and JavaScript targeting
*   Target a selected percentage of your users  
    

![Image 23](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac65e1135469f32fb8d52d_language.svg)

360° view of your feedback

*   Dashboards for multi-survey analysis New
*   Filter responses with data from HubSpot and Intercom  
    
*   Sync session data from Fullstory, SessionCam and Smartlook
*   Combine product analytics from Mixpanel & Amplitude  
    
*   Salesforce, Marketo and Pardot integrations  
    
*   Webhooks and Export API  
    

![Image 24](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac622362356f646a32b377_support_agent.svg)

Out-of-this-world support

*   Get priority live support from humans
*   Advanced data privacy and regulatory compliance standards  
    

[See all features](https://survicate.com/pricing/#pricing-compare-plans)

Best for:

*   Large teams needing custom solutions for feedback management
*   Companies requiring enterprise-grade security and deep system integrations

What's included:

![Image 25](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac65ffac3adca74849ea88_new_releases.svg)

Everything Survicate has to offer

*   All feedback channels: email, link, website, in-product and mobile app
*   Branded survey experience  
    
*   Dashboards for multi-survey analysis New  
    

![Image 26](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac660b9496ffbaf34fbbd2_handshake.svg)

White glove service & support

*   Dedicated Success Manager and outcomes plan
*   White-glove onboarding and training  
    
*   Live implementation assistance

![Image 27](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fca234a1c4867bb3d78dced/67ac6620cae1c9bb0571b0f4_verified_user.svg)

Industry-leading compliance and security

*   HIPAA compliance for healthcare data
*   Custom Terms of Service, DPA and NDA  
    
*   On-demand security reviews and questions  
    
*   Access logs for tracking user activity  
    
*   SAML SSO for secure organizational login  
    
*   Deliver surveys securely with CDN proxy  
    

[See all features](https://survicate.com/pricing/#pricing-compare-plans)

Responses

The total number of survey responses you can collect. We count a response when someone answers at least the first question.
